title: Now playing feature is shown artist names in Hindi only
content:
Now playing feature was working perfectly until, thursday, after that it shown the artist names in hindi only. I can't change the language. Yesterday, onwards, its shown in english for english songs for other songs like Tamil, Hindi , Malayalam, Telugu & Kannada means artist names shown in hindi only. Previously it shown english. Last thursday onwards it shown hindi only.

How can I change the language of that.
